description:
My place is in the heart of Brooklyn! 

The main Brooklyn subway station the 2 and 3 are close by. Bus stop on the corner as well.

Park within walking distance with playground and handball courts. Shopping is close by including Flatbush area. Supermarket within walking distance as well as places for take-out food. 

My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Right side entrance. Door at top of staircase on right side of house.
name: Cozy whole floor to yourself in Brooklyn
review: Lydia was very nice and answered immediately for me when I had a question. The place is as advertised, the price is fair. The location is not the best and it is not a fast walk to subway and include a long subway ride to anywhere. However it was worth the price.
